project_descr: Reducing GHG emissions from road transport in Russia's medium-sized cities: preparatory grant

outputs.output_descr: The objective of this Project Preparation Grant (PPG) is to develop a full project document for a UNDP/GEF project in Climate Change focal area addressing barriers to GHG emissions reduction in the urban road transport systems in medium-sized cities.

project_title: ppg: reducing ghg emissions from transport
